message: I propose dividing the money with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. Let me know if this works for you.
I'm willing to give you a decent chunk, but I think I deserve more. This is my best offer.
Considering inflation, I've adjusted our proposal to a 45/55 split. I believe this is fair given the diminishing value of money. Please let me know what you think.
I'm still not satisfied with the split. I think I deserve more considering the value of the money has decreased even further. This is my revised offer.
